page.title: 06BUILDINGS AND FACILITIES
page.content:
SNOWBALL FARM Was built 150 years ago in 1835.It used to be a dairy farm before it became the Horse Club.It is still a very popular Riding Club today.There are one hundred horses there;60 belong to Snowball Farm;and the rest to private owners.Snowball Farm makes its own hay for the horse,so in this way it is still a farm. __________
BURNHAM BEECHES HOTEL Is a food residential hotel with friendly service.It also provides for banquets,parties,conferences.It also has a tennis court,a games room with snooker and darts,and a putting green. The tennis costs one pound/court,one pound/key.
